page.title: 13RECREATION: DISCO DANCING
page.content: {AT A DISCO}there is a man who plays the records; he is called a Disc Jockey.At Discos there are flashing lights of different colours; they are called Disco-Lights. There are different styles of lights;sometimes they are made to flash in patterns on the ceiling and walls.They can hurt your eyes though. The records are played very loudly; they can hurt your ears! The boys always do break-dancing or body-popping.Here are some of the things that they do: {Head Spins, Caterpillar, Turtle, {Windmill, Back Flips, Popping, Hand {Spin, Knee Spin and Swallow Dive.} Parents do not like us doing break dancing because they say it is dangerous.Some people have hurt their necks but we still do it!
